message:
(Emitted value instead of an instance of Error) 
  Error compiling template:
  
  <b-card header="正晚点" :title="title" :sub-title="subtitle" >
    <delay-chart :data="delays"></delay-chart>
    <b-button variant="primary" href="/query/record?telecode={{telecode}}">查看历史记录</b-button>
  </b-card>
  
  - href="/query/record?telecode={{telecode}}": Interpolation inside attributes has been removed. Use v-bind or the colon shorthand instead. For example, instead of <div id="{{ val }}">, use <div :id="val">.
